Trial_Design.evidence: Patients with recurrent GBM were randomized into two groups

Intervention.evidence: Group A with unresectable disease received RO4929097 in a standard phase II design, while Group B with resectable disease received the drug before and after surgical resection.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the 6-month progression-free survival rate (PFS 6)

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomization was performed using [randomization method], with allocation concealment by [method].

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 47 patients were randomized, with 40 in Group A and 7 in Group B.

Harms.evidence: Adverse events were reported in [number] patients, with [frequency and severity].

Trial_Registration.evidence: The trial was registered under [trial registration number]
